name: Patriotic Pinball
overview: Experience two diverse tables: Road Trip Coast to Coast and America on Duty, each with their own unique theme, 3D rendered images and animated backgrounds; Accomplish seven exhilarating missions, such as The Battle of Gettysburg and Boot Camp in America; and seven exciting tours such as Gold Rush and Muscle Beach; Engage yourself in three multi-ball missions per table; A fully 3D perspective combined with ultra-realistic physics make this one of the best pinball video games of all time!
